title: Rocks and minerals: how do we identify them?
creator_credit: Tom Ascher and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Noticing the pattern, composition and texture of rocks we find that we can identify them, and gain clues how they are formed. Minerals are identified by tests which can lead to an understanding of processes occurring within the earth.
title_for_label: Rocks and minerals: how do we identify them?
